Functions

{% raw %}

say_hello[source]

say_hello(to)

Say hello to somebody

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def say_hello(to):
    "Say hello to somebody"
    return f'Hello {to}!'
{% endraw %}

Function lets you say hello to anyone!

{% raw %} 
say_hello('Deven')

'Hello Deven!'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert say_hello("Jeremy")=="Hello Jeremy!"
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class HelloSayer[source]

HelloSayer(to)

Say hello to to using say_hello

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

HelloSayer.say()

Do the saying
